body.name: MALKO Protector Display Case for Carded 3.75 Inch Action Figures | Compatible with: Marvel | G.I Joe | Reaction | 0.5 MM Thick | 6 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: Designed to fit 3.75 inch action figures vintage and new editions like: Star Wars, G.I Joe, Marvel Legends or ReAction
EXTRA THICK 0.5 MM PLASTIC: Almost feels like an acrylic case but for a fraction of the price.
NO ROOM FOR THE FIGURE TO MOVE: We have added 4 flaps inside the protector that will keep the figure inside away from any movement.
EASY TO PEEL PROTECTIVE FILM Each case is individually wrapped with its own wrapping film that keeps the protector from getting scratched before it gets to you.
100% RECYCLABLE By purchasing PET, you are doing your part to support their reuse, all parts of it can be recycled and turned into a multitude of new uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the best cases I’ve ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: Hands down one of the best plastic cases for 3.75” figures, it even fits the newer deluxe TVC figures which is a plus.Very easy to assemble and put figures into, also leaves enough space so the bubble of the figure doesn’t rub up against the case.Will surely buy more in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such great protector cases
reviews.reviewText: To be honest the 1st couple I had to "learn" how to best prioritize when to take the film off **1st by the way ** and how best to get the figures in ( in my case all original Vintage Star Wars-Jedi Figures) without potentially damaging the cards. But if you take your time and use these correctly, they are loads better than star cases. take up less real-estate and fit perfectly. I'm updating all my figures to these, no question

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Star Wars Retro Collection Carded Figures
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something affordable that would properly protect my Star Wars Retro Collection carded figures. These protectors fit my needs perfectly! They are much less expensive than the acrylic display cases, yet made of a think, heavy material that protects the contents very well. The size of the protector allows for a very slightly loose fit for the card with plenty of room for the blister, but the four folding tabs inside hold the card firmly in place. Also, the locking tabs are in the front which allows for clear and unimpeded viewing of the card back. The design is brilliant! If you want to save a little money, but still protect your carded figures well and in a way that allows for a nice display, then these protectors are for you!

reviews.reviewerName: Bring Me The Head Of Leonard Maltin
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad, Not Great... but It works good for storage.
reviews.reviewText: It's not too hard to figure out and most of my Reaction figures fit snug in the box. They do not tip over once I figured out to put the plastic flap of the closure in front of the card. I ordered another brand to see how it matches up (Star1 case)... I will let you know which one works better once they arrive. A final tip here... these come with a thin layer of plastic which makes the plastic look cloudy. If you want to display your figures, make sure to peel it off before putting the box together. Final Summary: I like them for storage protection for my figures... but expensive for plastic boxes with no choices to get a discount if you decide to buy bulk.EDIT: I think I prefer the Star 1 Case.. easier to assemble and the cards fit nice and snug. Its not as rectangular as these, but you get a good discount if you buy more than 20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product to protect your figures. At first I thought they looked like 💩 but then I realized they had a protective film on them 😂 Oops! It took me a few tries to figure it out but they were perfect after I figured it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable alternative to those expensive display case. Quality is A+ and fit Reaction Figure.
reviews.reviewText: Affordable alternative to those expensive display case. Quality is A+ and fit Reaction Figure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These are beyond terrible!
reviews.reviewText: I thought someone was playing a sick joke on me when I opened these. First, the plastic on these were all scratched up. Like really bad really noticeable. Second, the plastic box does not lay flat once built. Do you need a third reason to NOT buy these? Save yourself the return hassle. TERRIBLE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice case. What a difference these cases made with my Rock Lords! Thanks!
